translation.en: [man in French] I think the word captain is…
translation.zh: 我认为“队长”一词…

translation.en: Is above all a feeling of pride.
translation.zh: 首先代表了一种自豪感

translation.en: [man in Portuguese] You give that responsibility only to people you trust.
translation.zh: 这份重责大任你只会交给自己信任的人

translation.en: [man in Croatian] You need to be your manager's right hand.
translation.zh: 你要成为领队的得力助手

translation.en: [man in Arabic] A good player does not always make a good leader or captain.
translation.zh: 优秀的球员未必能成为优秀的领袖或队长

translation.en: [man 1 in English] It's the best thing that can happen to anyone.
translation.zh: 这是一个人能拥有的最幸福的际遇

translation.en: [man 2] Wearing the captain band,
translation.zh: 戴着队长臂章 你就不能露怯

translation.en: you can't show fear. You can't show nerves.
translation.zh: 戴着队长臂章 你就不能露怯 不能显露出紧张

translation.en: Silencing them is gonna feel good, eh?
translation.zh: 让他们哑口无言感觉会很好哈？

translation.en: I work hard for you. You work hard for me.
translation.zh: 我为你拼搏 你为我努力

translation.en: [Blake] We wanna go to the World Cup.
translation.zh: 我们想去参加世界杯

translation.en: [Maatouk in Arabic] Everyone's counting on us.
translation.zh: 大家就指望着我们了

translation.en: [Modrić in Croatian] It will be emotional and difficult.
translation.zh: 那会非常激动人心 也非常困难

translation.en: [Aubameyang in French] It's a whole country behind you.
translation.zh: 你身后是整个国家

translation.en: -[in Jamaican Patois] Think I like losing? -[in Croatian] Clear it.
translation.zh: 你以为我喜欢输？ 大脚解围

translation.en: [Silva in Portuguese] I am getting goosebumps.
translation.zh: 我都会起鸡皮疙瘩

translation.en: We're going to Qatar!
translation.zh: 我们要去卡塔尔啦！

translation.en: [Modrić in Croatian] I don't like to talk about myself as if I'm bragging,
translation.zh: 我说自己的时候不喜欢表现得好像是在炫耀…

translation.en: but I always had the feeling I was a leader.
translation.zh: 但我一直都觉得自己是个领袖

translation.en: [man 1 in French] Good evening, everyone.
translation.zh: 大家晚上好

translation.en: After a busy night of African qualifiers for the World Cup 2022 in Qatar…
translation.zh: 在2022年卡塔尔世界杯非洲预选赛的忙碌之夜过后…

translation.en: …we're back focusing on the Panthers of Gabon
translation.zh: 我们将注意力重新转回加蓬“黑豹队”

translation.en: whose campaign has just gotten underway against Libya.
translation.zh: 他们刚刚开始了和利比亚的比赛

translation.en: Gabon scored first.
translation.zh: 加蓬队率先得分

translation.en: [man 2] It's a nice combination from Gabon.
translation.zh: 这是来自加蓬队的一次精彩配合

translation.en: And it's in off the post.
translation.zh: 球射到了门外

translation.en: The Gabonese defense was all over the place.
translation.zh: 加蓬队的防守密不透风

translation.en: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang with the strike!
translation.zh: 皮埃尔埃梅里克奥巴梅扬起脚射门！

translation.en: Just a few seconds left in this game.
translation.zh: 本场比赛只剩下几秒钟了

translation.en: A cross into the box. The header!
translation.zh: 横传到禁区 头球！

translation.en: And it's Libya in the final minute
translation.zh: 利比亚队在最后一分钟

translation.en: that take the lead.
translation.zh: 获得领先

translation.en: Gabon crack at the end of the game.
translation.zh: 加蓬队在比赛尾声功败垂成

translation.en: [reporter] It was a big upset. Libya gaining a shock win.
translation.zh: 这是次超级大反转利比亚队大获全胜

translation.en: [Aubameyang] I was pissed off.
translation.zh: 我很气恼

translation.en: We were all disappointed.
translation.zh: 我们都很失望

translation.en: It's our fault.
translation.zh: 这是我们的失误

translation.en: It's not even the opponent. It's us.
translation.zh: 甚至与对手无关 是我们自己

translation.en: I don't want to miss out.
translation.zh: 我不想错失机会

translation.en: [reporter] Will Aubameyang ever get the chance to play at a World Cup?
translation.zh: 奥巴梅扬是否能有机会登上世界杯的赛场？

translation.en: For sure he belongs on that stage, but do Gabon?
translation.zh: 毫无疑问 他是属于这个舞台的… （加蓬训练中心 弗朗斯维尔） …但加蓬是否够格？

translation.en: [Aubameyang] I was born in France, but I grew up like an African.
translation.zh: 我在法国出生但我是被以非洲人的方式抚养长大的

translation.en: People ask me the question, "Why?"
translation.zh: 很多人问我：“为什么？”

translation.en: "Why did you choose Gabon?"
translation.zh: “你为什么选择了加蓬队？”

translation.en: My father.
translation.zh: 我父亲

translation.en: The first memory in my head,
translation.zh: 我脑海中的第一段记忆

translation.en: I was very small.
translation.zh: 我当时还很小

translation.en: My father was playing.
translation.zh: 我父亲正在踢球 （加蓬）

translation.en: He scored a goal.
translation.zh: 他进了一个球

translation.en: [commentator] Oh, the goal of Aubame!
translation.zh: 噢 奥巴射门得分！

translation.en: Wow. It was incredible how many people were cheering.
translation.zh: 欢呼的人群让人感叹不已

translation.en: I was thinking, "What's going on?"
translation.zh: 我当时想：“什么情况？”

translation.en: It was a very powerful moment.
translation.zh: 那是个非常震撼的瞬间

translation.en: We scored some goals tonight, which felt good for the team.
translation.zh: 我们今晚进了几个球整个球队都很开心

translation.en: The most important thing is winning.
translation.zh: 最重要的是取得胜利

translation.en: I think from that point on,
translation.zh: 从那时起我就想

translation.en: he was my role model.
translation.zh: 他是我的榜样

translation.en: [man] I like fashion, so does Pierre-Emerick.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢时尚 皮埃尔埃梅里克也是

translation.en: In the evening, when you put on something like this.
translation.zh: 晚上穿上这样的衣服…

translation.en: Something like this. Whoo!
translation.zh: 简直帅呆了 哇哦！

translation.en: When he sees this, Pierre-Emerick, he'll want to steal it from me.
translation.zh: 皮埃尔埃梅里克 他看到这个的话他会想把我的衣服偷走的

translation.en: Well, no stealing.
translation.zh: 把它偷走

translation.en: It's for me. [laughs]
translation.zh: 但这是我的

translation.en: I realized he had something when he was about five years old.
translation.zh: 他五岁的时候 我发现他挺有天赋

translation.en: We started playing football, and I had the ball.
translation.zh: 我们开始一起踢球 球在我脚下

translation.en: Very quickly, he takes the ball, accelerates, and shoots.
translation.zh: 他一溜烟儿抢走了球 快跑 然后射门

translation.en: I said, "Wow. He has something."
translation.zh: 我说：“哇 他有两下子”

translation.en: As I'd already been a professional footballer,
translation.zh: 因为我当时已经是职业球员了

translation.en: I had seen a lot of physical duels.
translation.zh: 我见识过许多的肢体对决

translation.en: [commentator 1] Aubame.
translation.zh: 奥巴

translation.en: [laughs] Playing with my father…
translation.zh: 和我父亲一起踢球…

translation.en: [commentator 2] Look at Aubame. Looking a little like Michael Jackson.
translation.zh: 看看奥巴 他有点像迈克尔杰克逊

translation.en: …it was hard.
translation.zh: …非常不容易

translation.en: We did a lot of one-on-ones.
translation.zh: 我们经常一对一练习

translation.en: There were no fouls, so it was very physical. [laughs]
translation.zh: 没什么犯不犯规的 所以非常粗暴

translation.en: [man] His father educated him according to the morals of a patrilineal society
translation.zh: 他的父亲按照父系社会的道德观教育他 因为他属于芳人部族

translation.en: because he belongs to the Fang tribe.
translation.zh: 因为他属于芳人部族

translation.en: It is a society where the concept of the father is very strong
translation.zh: 在这个群体中 父亲的形象非常强悍

translation.en: with extremely rigorous values.
translation.zh: 有着极其严苛的价值观

translation.en: Maybe it was those values, those cultural elements,
translation.zh: 也许就是那些价值观、那些文化要素

translation.en: that led him to make the choices he made.
translation.zh: 让他做出了曾经的那些决定

translation.en: -He'd fall, but we kept playing. -"Never complain."
translation.zh: -他会摔倒 但我们仍然会继续踢-“永不抱怨”

translation.en: [Pierre-François] You couldn't say, "That's wrong."
translation.zh: 你不能说：“犯规”

translation.en: If you say that, I get mad.
translation.zh: 要是你这么说 我就会生气

translation.en: "Never complain. Get back up and continue."
translation.zh: “永不抱怨 起来继续”

translation.en: It was an African education.
translation.zh: 这是种非洲式教育

translation.en: The hard way,
translation.zh: 困难模式

translation.en: but in France.
translation.zh: 只不过我们是在法国

translation.en: So…
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: -You see what you did? So good. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 你看到你刚刚的表现了吗？非常好

translation.en: So, so good.
translation.zh: 非常非常棒

translation.en: [Aubameyang] My dad was very hard on me,
translation.zh: 我爸爸对我非常严厉

translation.en: but that's what makes me strong today.
translation.zh: 但这成就了如今强大的我

translation.en: [Pierre-François] When I watched him play,
translation.zh: 当我看着他踢球时

translation.en: I could only go now and again, and I would turn up by surprise.
translation.zh: 我只能时不时地去 我会突然造访

translation.en: I never celebrated his goals.
translation.zh: 我从来没有为他的进球欢呼过

translation.en: When he did score, he would look to me, and I'd just stay like this.
translation.zh: 他得分的时候就会看向我我总是保持这个样子

translation.en: All the parents are screaming, and I was like this.
translation.zh: 所有家长都在尖叫而我就这样看着他 然后这样

translation.en: Voilà.
translation.zh: 这个

translation.en: The FA Cup final.
translation.zh: 英格兰足总杯决赛

translation.en: That's the captain's armband that he wore when he won the FA Cup.
translation.zh: 这是他赢得足总杯时戴着的队长臂章

translation.en: Voilà.
translation.zh: 这个

translation.en: And this is the shirt that won that.
translation.zh: 这是赢得这个比赛的球衣

translation.en: So here we have,
translation.zh: 这里写着

translation.en: "This is for you."
translation.zh: “这是属于你的”

translation.en: Also for me, and here,
translation.zh: 还有给我的 然后这里

translation.en: "I love you."
translation.zh: “我爱你”

translation.en: How can you not be proud?
translation.zh: 你怎么能不骄傲呢？

translation.en: Voilà.
translation.zh: 就是这样

translation.en: [Tonda] He could have been a world champion with the French team,
translation.zh: 在法国队 他可以成为世界冠军

translation.en: but his father is Gabonese.
translation.zh: 但他父亲是加蓬人

translation.en: It was such an inspiration for me to follow in his footsteps.
translation.zh: 追随他的步伐对我来说是种莫大的启发

translation.en: Whether it is in life or on the pitch.
translation.zh: 不管是在生活中 还是在球场上

translation.en: Even if we get knocked down,
translation.zh: 就算被打倒

translation.en: we get back up and we keep going.
translation.zh: 我们也会站起来继续前进

translation.en: We're playing for something extraordinary in the end.
translation.zh: 最终 我们是为了某个非凡的目标而踢球

translation.en: Qualifying for the World Cup, this has never happened for Gabon,
translation.zh: 获得世界杯的参赛资格这对加蓬来说史无前例

translation.en: and, of course, my father.
translation.zh: 当然 对我父亲也一样

translation.en: Yeah, it pisses me off that we didn't get a result.
translation.zh: 是的 没能取得好成绩让我非常恼火

translation.en: The night before, we were all on the same page.
translation.zh: 前一晚 我们还都在同一起跑线上

translation.en: [Pierre-François] We got frustrated. We got frustrated.
translation.zh: 我们非常沮丧

translation.en: We were all over the place, but ultimately, it's up to us.
translation.zh: 我们就像一盘散沙但最终 这得靠我们自己

translation.en: It was our fault.
translation.zh: 是我们的问题

translation.en: We should be difficult to get past.
translation.zh: 我们应该防守得更好的

translation.en: We've got to be honest. We didn't do that well enough.
translation.zh: 我们必须承认 我们做得还不够好

translation.en: Look, we've got a match coming up. We just need to put in the practice.
translation.zh: 现在我们知道了 接下来还有比赛我们只需要把它付诸实践就行了

translation.en: [Tonda] Aubameyang, obviously, is the superstar.
translation.zh: 奥巴梅扬 他是那个超级巨星

translation.en: He is the bearer of the Gabonese flag.
translation.zh: 他是加蓬队的旗手

translation.en: If he manages to motivate his young teammates,
translation.zh: 如果他能激励那些年轻的队友

translation.en: if he can give them enough motivation to qualify,
translation.zh: 能够给他们足够的动力去争取出线

translation.en: I think it will be the best gift he will give to his country.
translation.zh: 我想这将是他献给自己祖国的最好的礼物

translation.en: [announcer in English] The best player of the year,
translation.zh: 年度最佳球员

translation.en: Luka Modrić.
translation.zh: 卢卡莫德里奇

translation.en: [Modrić in Croatian] All those awards I've received, it's just phenomenal.
translation.zh: 我获得的各种奖项非常了不起

translation.en: [man] For the last ten years, Ronaldo and Messi shared the Ballon d'Or.
translation.zh: 过去十年里一直是罗纳尔多和梅西在瓜分金球奖

translation.en: [man] It's you!
translation.zh: 是你！

translation.en: [Modrić in Croatian] There's a sadness there, at least for me.
translation.zh: 但其中有件憾事 至少对我来说是的

translation.en: [Modrić in Croatian] I think about that final every day.
translation.zh: 我每天都在想着那场决赛

translation.en: [Modrić in Croatian] It still has a hold on me.
translation.zh: 它仍然在影响着我

translation.en: [in English] ♪ La-la-la-la-la-la, la-la ♪
translation.zh: （克罗地亚队在32支队伍中排名18）

translation.en: ♪ I've had my share of fame ♪
translation.zh: （闯入2018年国际足联世界杯总决赛） （队长卢卡莫德里奇赢得联赛最佳球员称号）

translation.en: ♪ You know my name ♪
translation.zh: （队长卢卡莫德里奇赢得联赛最佳球员称号）

translation.en: [in Croatian] Let me see how you receive it.
translation.zh: 让我看看你怎么接这个球

translation.en: Bravo!
translation.zh: 非常好！

translation.en: Let's do keepie uppies, the three of us.
translation.zh: 我们三个来颠球吧

translation.en: Show me some of your tricks.
translation.zh: 露两手给我看看

translation.en: You're pretty good at this.
translation.zh: 你很擅长颠球啊

translation.en: The best things never come easy.
translation.zh: 好事多磨

translation.en: Throughout my life and career,
translation.zh: 在我的生活和职业生涯中

translation.en: nothing has come easy to me.
translation.zh: 没有什么是一挥而就的

translation.en: First.
translation.zh: 第一

translation.en: [man] Luka.
translation.zh: 卢卡

translation.en: [Modrić] I don't like to talk about it…
translation.zh: 我不想谈论…

translation.en: …the thing that has marked me for life.
translation.zh: 那件让我终生难忘的事

translation.en: I was small, very small.
translation.zh: 我当时还小 非常小

translation.en: I remember some things.
translation.zh: 我记得一些事

translation.en: I still remember my grandfather very well.
translation.zh: 我还清楚地记得我爷爷

translation.en: He was a kind of protector for me.
translation.zh: 他就像是我的守护者

translation.en: If I'd been naughty with my mom and dad, he would be there to defend me.
translation.zh: 要是我不听妈妈爸爸的话他就会过来保护我

translation.en: He took me everywhere with him.
translation.zh: 他去哪儿都带着我

translation.en: There were a lot of animals, and he was with them around the clock.
translation.zh: 有很多动物 他成天都和它们在一起

translation.en: So when he would take them to graze, he would take me too.
translation.zh: 所以当他要带他们去吃草时就会也带我一起

translation.en: I didn't go to kindergarten.
translation.zh: 我没有去上幼儿园

translation.en: I was up at my grandparents' house.
translation.zh: 我是在爷爷奶奶家长大的

translation.en: That's where I lived.
translation.zh: 那就是我之前住的地方

translation.en: I have really lovely memories.
translation.zh: 我有过非常美好的回忆

translation.en: A carefree childhood until…
translation.zh: 一段无忧无虑的童年 直到…

translation.en: To be honest, I don't even like to think about this.
translation.zh: 老实说 我甚至不愿去回忆这件事

translation.en: I was very young.
translation.zh: 我当时还很小

translation.en: That's what stayed with me the most from my childhood.
translation.zh: 这是我童年最难以忘怀的事情

translation.en: Although I don't like… I don't like to talk about it.
translation.zh: 虽然我不喜欢…我不喜欢谈论这件事

translation.en: We had to escape from our home
translation.zh: 我们不得不逃离家园

translation.en: and go take refuge in hotels.
translation.zh: 去酒店里避难

translation.en: [Oštrić] We spent six years here.
translation.zh: 我们在这里待了六年

translation.en: Luka lived on the third floor, and I lived on the first floor.
translation.zh: 卢卡住在三楼 我住在一楼

translation.en: [Modrić] It wasn't easy to live at that time.
translation.zh: 那段时期 生活不易

translation.en: You hear those sirens, those bombs dropping, the missiles.
translation.zh: 你会听到警报声、炸弹投掷声、导弹声

translation.en: [Oštrić] It's impossible not to feel fear when that's going on.
translation.zh: 在那种情况下 不害怕是不可能

translation.en: [Modrić] When I look at these childhood pictures, I'm always with a ball.
translation.zh: 当我看童年的照片时照片上总是有个足球

translation.en: You can immediately see
translation.zh: 你很快就看得出来 足球将成为

translation.en: that the ball is going to play an important role in my life.
translation.zh: 你很快就看得出来 足球将成为 我生命中举足轻重的一部分

translation.en: Football was definitely a way out
translation.zh: 足球绝对是一种

translation.en: of everything that was going on around us.
translation.zh: 逃避我们周遭发生的一切的途径

translation.en: We'd use two stones as goalposts
translation.zh: 我们用两块石头当门柱

translation.en: at both ends of the parking lot.
translation.zh: 放在停车场的两端

translation.en: [Modrić] And that's how it all started.
translation.zh: 一切就是这样开始的…

translation.en: On the tarmac in front of the hotel…
translation.zh: 在酒店前面的柏油路上…

translation.en: where you got hit and pushed around.
translation.zh: 你就在那里被大家推来撞去

translation.en: I was amongst the smaller kids.
translation.zh: 我属于较小的那群孩子

translation.en: There was no complaining or crying.
translation.zh: 没有抱怨或哭泣

translation.en: You would move on and fight for yourself.
translation.zh: 你会不断继续 为自己而战

translation.en: I was named after my grandfather.
translation.zh: 我是以爷爷的名字为名的

translation.en: I'm sad that he didn't get to see… at least some of what I've achieved.
translation.zh: 我很难过他没能看到我取得的这些成绩

translation.en: But certainly, he's up there looking down on me, cheering me on.
translation.zh: 但毋庸置疑他一定在上面看着我 为我加油

translation.en: And I'm sure he's proud of me.
translation.zh: 我相信他一定会以我为傲

translation.en: [Blake in English] We wanna go to the World Cup. We haven't been there since '98.
translation.zh: 我们想要打入世界杯1998年后 我们就再也没出过线了

translation.en: [commentator] Victory in Jamaica.
translation.zh: 牙买加队胜利

translation.en: Jamaica has advanced to France '98.
translation.zh: 牙买加队晋级1998年法国世界杯

translation.en: [Blake in English] I can't even start to imagine,
translation.zh: 我甚至无法想象

translation.en: how would it feel for the nation, for the players…
translation.zh: 对全国人民、对球员们…

translation.en: [all in Jamaican Patois] We will do!
translation.zh: 必胜！

translation.en: [Blake in English] …and for me as a captain to be going to the World Cup.
translation.zh: …对身为队长的我来说闯入世界杯的心情会是怎样

translation.en: What a moment that would be.
translation.zh: 那会是个多么美好的时刻啊

translation.en: What a moment.
translation.zh: 多么美好的时刻

translation.en: [man] When we qualified in 1998,
translation.zh: 1998年 我们晋级世界杯

translation.en: it was the biggest thing to happen in Jamaica since independence.
translation.zh: 那是牙买加独立后最重大的事件

translation.en: They declared a national holiday.
translation.zh: 他们宣布让全国放假

translation.en: [woman] Results have to improve if we're going to qualify this time.
translation.zh: 如果这次我们能出线的话成绩一定要有所提高

translation.en: One game, one defeat, and the Reggae Boyz are bottom of the group.
translation.zh: 赛了一场 输了一场“雷鬼男孩”在小组中垫底

translation.en: [in Jamaican Patois] '98-- World Cup '98, I was eight.
translation.zh: 1998年的世界杯 那时候我八岁

translation.en: You were eight? I wasn't even seven then.
translation.zh: 你有八岁？我当时连七岁都还不到

translation.en: -You were six. -Let's work it out.
translation.zh: -你才六岁-我们来算算

translation.en: -I'm 1990. When were you born? '92? -'94.
You are '94?
translation.zh: 你是1994年的？

translation.en: In 1998, you were four. You're a baby.
translation.zh: 1998年 你才四岁 你还是个宝宝

translation.en: You were really young, so you probably can't remember that.
translation.zh: 你当时太小了 所以你大概不会记得

translation.en: You're DeAndre's age.
translation.zh: 你和迪安德尔一样大

translation.en: I was eight, and I can't even remember much.
translation.zh: 我有八岁 但我也没什么印象

translation.en: Jamaica used to have one of the best, uh, World Cup songs.
translation.zh: 牙买加队曾经拥有世界杯最佳歌曲之一

translation.en: -♪ Whoa, whoa, whoa ♪ -Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: The song's really hard, ya know?
translation.zh: 这首歌真的很难 你知道吗？

translation.en: ♪ Rise up ♪
translation.zh: 起来

translation.en: -[laughs] -I…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: ♪ Stand and take your place ♪
translation.zh: 起来顶上了你的位置

translation.en: Yes. Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [in English] Winning bringing healing to a nation because you know what it does?
translation.zh: 胜利能为一个国家带去疗愈 你知道它能做什么吗？它能把大家团结在一起

translation.en: It brings the people together.
translation.zh: 你知道它能做什么吗？它能把大家团结在一起

translation.en: It unifies them, even if it's for one moment.
translation.zh: 它将大家凝聚在一起哪怕只有那么一会儿

translation.en: It's like, when they win, we all win.
translation.zh: 感觉他们获胜时 我们大家都赢了

translation.en: And when they lose, we all lose.
translation.zh: 他们失败时 我们大家都输了

translation.en: ♪ Your journey has just begun ♪
translation.zh: （牙买加对战巴拿马前48小时）

translation.en: -♪ Rise up ♪ -♪ Rise up ♪ -♪ Stand like the brave ♪ -♪ Oh yeah ♪
translation.zh: （牙买加训练场 金斯顿）

translation.en: [Blake] We have a great group,
translation.zh: 我们有个很棒的团队

translation.en: but I don't think the group understands yet
translation.zh: 但我觉得队员们还没弄清楚

translation.en: what it's gonna take to get to a World Cup.
translation.zh: 晋级世界杯需要付出些什么

translation.en: It's something that I've detected. As a leader, I have to fix.
translation.zh: 作为领头人我必须发现并解决这一点

translation.en: If we feel like because we have talent we won't have to work,
translation.zh: 如果我们觉得自己天赋异禀我们就不会努力了

translation.en: we're gonna have a problem.
translation.zh: 那我们就有麻烦了

translation.en: We have pride for our country.
translation.zh: 我们为自己的祖国感到骄傲

translation.en: We have pride for our athletes
translation.zh: 我们对运动员们感到骄傲

translation.en: who go out there and actually do their best.
translation.zh: 他们在赛场上拼尽了全力

translation.en: And we know most of them don't come back to no big accolades.
translation.zh: 我们知道 他们中的大部分人回来后并没有获得什么赞誉

translation.en: [Blake] It's one of the most talented groups we've ever had.
translation.zh: 那是我们史上最有天赋的队伍之一

translation.en: But if you don't fit the system
translation.zh: 但如果你不适合这个体系

translation.en: or you're not in with what we're about, then I don't think we need you.
translation.zh: 或者你并不认同我们的观点那我也不觉得我们会需要你

translation.en: I would describe this current team as, um,
translation.zh: 我会把现在这支队伍描述成

translation.en: a mixture of English and Jamaican-born players.
translation.zh: 是由英国和牙买加出生的球员组成的

translation.en: We have 23 guys coming in.
translation.zh: 我们有23个人要加入进来

translation.en: Twenty-three different backgrounds and 23 different egos.
translation.zh: 23个不同的背景 23种不同的个性

translation.en: It's hard.
translation.zh: 这很困难

translation.en: [in Jamaican Patois] This way.
translation.zh: 这边

translation.en: When we have the next one,
translation.zh: 等下一次

translation.en: if you can, and there's nothing on the left,
translation.zh: 如果你可以 而且左边也没什么防守

translation.en: you can pull back and you can press out again.
translation.zh: 你可以后撤 然后再次突围

translation.en: [Blake in English] I wanna win. And, you know,
translation.zh: 我想赢 另外

translation.en: if I sense that the unity is not there, you know,
translation.zh: 如果我感觉大家凝聚力不够

translation.en: I tend to get really worried.
translation.zh: 我会变得很担心

translation.en: [manager] That's it. Let us pray.
translation.zh: 好了 我们一起祈祷吧

translation.en: As we carry the hopes and dreams of our people,
translation.zh: 因为我们肩负着同胞的希望与梦想

translation.en: let us understand that our service is first and foremost to our people.
translation.zh: 我们要明白首先且最要效忠的是我们的同胞

translation.en: [Blake] You're not gonna be able to beat a good team
translation.zh: 如果不能团结一心

translation.en: if you're not together.
translation.zh: 就无法战胜强队

translation.en: Where we are weak, let us be strong.
translation.zh: 请让我们的劣势得到弥补

translation.en: That we will overcome
translation.zh: 我们将会征服

translation.en: the many rivers we have to cross.
translation.zh: 并跨过漫漫前路上的所有河川

translation.en: [man 1 in French] Gabon against Egypt, an important match.
translation.zh: 加蓬对埃及 一场重要的比赛

translation.en: [man 2] Aubameyang in Franceville against Salah. I would never have imagined that.
translation.zh: 奥巴梅扬在弗朗斯维尔对战萨拉赫这是我从来没有想过的

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: [man 2] The cream of African football.
translation.zh: 非洲足球的翘楚

translation.en: [Aubameyang] Mohamed Salah… He's a very nice person.
translation.zh: 默罕默德萨拉赫 他是个非常好的人

translation.en: We have a very good relationship,
translation.zh: 我们的关系非常好

translation.en: but it's over.
translation.zh: 但一切都结束了

translation.en: [man 3] We hope national icon Aubameyang can lead us to victory.
translation.zh: 我们希望国民偶像奥巴梅扬能带领我们取胜

translation.en: [player] Come, look!
translation.zh: 来啊 快看！

translation.en: [Pierre-François] Football,
translation.zh: 足球

translation.en: it is a religion for the Gabonese.
translation.zh: 对加蓬人来说 就是一种信仰

translation.en: [player] Yes, that's it!
translation.zh: 很好 就是这样！

translation.en: Football connects ethnicities and communities
translation.zh: 足球把各个民族和不同社群联系在了一起

translation.en: because it transcends.
translation.zh: 因为它超越了一切

translation.en: [player] There!
translation.zh: 那边！

translation.en: [Tonda] It makes people forget a lot.
translation.zh: 它让人们忘却了很多东西

translation.en: If you have problems, you forget them
translation.zh: 如果你身陷烦恼 你会忘了它们

translation.en: because the national team is playing.
translation.zh: 因为国家队要比赛了

translation.en: [reporter 1] Everyone's predicting a win for the Panthers.
translation.zh: 大家都在预测“黑豹队”会获胜

translation.en: Are we being too optimistic?
translation.zh: 我们是不是过于乐观了？

translation.en: [reporter 2] It's patriotism that is overshadowing realism ahead of this match.
translation.zh: 这场比赛前 爱国主义掩盖了现实

translation.en: This moment of fusion in the body of the nation
translation.zh: 奥巴梅扬这个名字

translation.en: takes place through the name Aubameyang
translation.zh: 让这个国家上下齐心融为了一体

translation.en: because he is the embodiment of the nation.
translation.zh: 因为他成为了这个国家的化身

translation.en: [Aubameyang] The people of Gabon are very welcoming.
translation.zh: 加蓬的人民非常热情

translation.en: There is a solidarity.
translation.zh: 我们团结一致

translation.en: I want to show them that I will do anything for the team.
translation.zh: 我想让他们看到我会为球队倾尽一切

translation.en: That they can count on me.
translation.zh: 他们可以信任我

translation.en: I'm the captain of Gabon.
translation.zh: 我是加蓬的队长

translation.en: Representing Africa…
translation.zh: 代表了非洲…

translation.en: That's why I'm here.
translation.zh: 这就是我在这儿的原因

translation.en: [reporter 1 in English] Greetings, football family.
translation.zh: 足球大家庭 你们好

translation.en: Happy World Cup qualifiers.
translation.zh: 世界杯预选赛快乐

translation.en: We have got big problems with the Jamaican national team right now.
translation.zh: 牙买加国家队现在有大麻烦了

translation.en: [reporter 2] We've gambled on some new players
translation.zh: 我们把希望押在了一些

translation.en: who have only just qualified to play for Jamaica.
translation.zh: 刚刚获得资格为牙买加而战的新球员身上

translation.en: [reporter 1] Throwing players together doesn't really work.
translation.zh: 光是把球员们聚在一起是不行的

translation.en: You have to feel for Andre Blake,
translation.zh: 你们得理解安德烈布莱克

translation.en: captain of a side who have barely trained together.
translation.zh: 一支几乎没有合训过的球队的队长

translation.en: [Blake] You guys ready to sing later?
translation.zh: 你们准备好待会儿唱歌了吗？

translation.en: [player] I already sang.
translation.zh: 我已经唱过了

translation.en: [Blake] When new players come in, they have to sing a song.
translation.zh: 有新球员加入时 他们必须唱首歌

translation.en: That's kind of a way to come together collectively
translation.zh: 这是融入集体的一种方法

translation.en: and to just have some fun.
translation.zh: 也是为了开心一下

translation.en: Tonight, big stage show.
translation.zh: 今晚 大型表演

translation.en: [Marley] Music is so important to sports, you know?
translation.zh: 音乐对体育来说非常重要 知道吗？

translation.en: It's like it kinda… it kinda goes hand in hand.
translation.zh: 差不多可以说是相辅相成的

translation.en: [player 1] Roofe's ready.
translation.zh: 鲁飞准备好了

translation.en: [Roofe] Roofe's not ready, fam.
translation.zh: 鲁飞还没准备好 家人们

translation.en: Roofe says he's opening the show.
translation.zh: 鲁飞说他要做开场了

translation.en: [Blake] For me, unity is one of the most important things.
translation.zh: 对我来说 团结是最重要的条件之一

translation.en: Sometimes you can tell when that's not there.
translation.zh: 有时候 你看得出来大家不齐心

translation.en: Like I said, don't expect anything good.
translation.zh: 正如我说过的 不要期望值太高

translation.en: Hey, no, it doesn't need to be good, bro.
translation.zh: （凯玛尔鲁飞 牙买加前锋） 不用很好

translation.en: They heard about you, eh? [laughs]
translation.zh: -有摄像机在 我不唱-他们听闻你要来啦？

translation.en: They heard about your big performance tonight.
translation.zh: 他们听说了你今晚要粉墨登场

translation.en: [Blake] All right! All right!
translation.zh: 好啦！

translation.en: Showtime!
translation.zh: 表演时间！

translation.en: -[singing] -[players drumming, exclaiming]
translation.zh: （安德烈格雷 牙买加前锋）

translation.en: Oh, next!
translation.zh: 下一个！

translation.en: All the way from England,
translation.zh: 从英国远道而来

translation.en: Lowe is here to take it.
translation.zh: 洛伊要横扫千军

translation.en: -[player 1] One word. -[player 2] It's all we're asking for.
translation.zh: -一个字-我们只有这点要求

translation.en: [chanting] One word! Word! Word! Word!
translation.zh: 一个字！字！字！字！

translation.en: ♪ Got somebody ♪
translation.zh: 有个人…

translation.en: Players only!
translation.zh: 只要球员！

translation.en: Remove yourself!
translation.zh: 走开！

translation.en: [Blake] The biggest challenge right now going into the World Cup qualifiers
translation.zh: 现在 参加世界杯预选赛要面临的最大挑战

translation.en: is to get this group to play as a team.
translation.zh: 就是如何让大家像个团队一样去比赛

translation.en: [Aubameyang in French] When it's game day, I always have goosebumps.
translation.zh: 每次一到比赛日 我就会起鸡皮疙瘩

translation.en: I'm ready to give everything to make the team succeed.
translation.zh: 我已经准备好了要不惜一切地带领球队取胜

translation.en: [Blake in English] I get nervous sometimes.
translation.zh: 我有时候会觉得紧张

translation.en: The bigger the game, the bigger the moment.
translation.zh: 越重大的比赛 时间就越久

translation.en: [commentator in Croatian] We are live from the Luzhniki Stadium,
translation.zh: 我们正在卢日尼基体育场进行直播

translation.en: the mythical ground of Croatian football.
translation.zh: 这里是克罗地亚足球的神话之地

translation.en: This is where we played the legendary final against the French.
translation.zh: 这里就是我们与法国队完成了那次传奇对决的地方

translation.en: Memories that will live on forever.
translation.zh: 一段流芳百世的记忆

translation.en: The absence of captain Luka Modrić
translation.zh: 队长卢卡莫德里奇的缺席

translation.en: has of course worried everyone in the national team.
translation.zh: 让国家队的所有人忧心忡忡

translation.en: [Modrić] Unfortunately, because of an injury, I couldn't be with the national team.
translation.zh: 很不幸 因为受伤我无法和国家队的大家在一起

translation.en: [commentator] It's clear how much of a blow his absence is for Croatia.
translation.zh: 很明显 他的缺席给克罗地亚队造成了很大的打击

translation.en: But as Coach Dalić said ahead of the match,
translation.zh: 但正如达利奇教练在赛前所说

translation.en: Croatia will soon have to face a future without Luka.
translation.zh: 克罗地亚队很快就要面对没有卢卡的未来了

translation.en: [Modrić] I'm aware that I'm of a certain age,
translation.zh: 我意识到自己已经有了一些年纪

translation.en: and that this is my last competition with the Croatian national team.
translation.zh: 这是我代表克罗地亚国家队出征的最后一次比赛

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: [in English] Who's playing, Sofi?
translation.zh: 谁在踢球啊 索菲？

translation.en: [in Croatian] Who's playing?
translation.zh: 谁在踢球？

translation.en: Who's playing?
translation.zh: 谁在踢球？

translation.en: Who's playing?
translation.zh: 谁在踢球？

translation.en: Is it Croatia? Huh?
translation.zh: 是克罗地亚队吗？

translation.en: -Croatia. -Croatia.
translation.zh: -克罗地亚-克罗地亚

translation.en: What do you think the score will be?
translation.zh: 你们觉得比分会是多少？

translation.en: -Two-one. -Two-one.
translation.zh: -二比一-二比一

translation.en: -[Sofia in English] Daddy! -[in Croatian] Is it a regular game?
translation.zh: 爸爸！ 这是场普通的比赛吗？

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: [in English] Friendly. Friendly. -Huh? -Friendly.
translation.zh: 这是友谊赛吗？

translation.en: [in Croatian] No, these are the World Cup qualifiers.
translation.zh: 不是 这是世界杯预选赛

translation.en: -Yes. For Qatar. -Then we have to win.
translation.zh: -对 为了去卡塔尔-那我们就必须得赢了

translation.en: Of course, if it were a friendly…
translation.zh: 当然 如果是友谊赛…

translation.en: [in English] Sofi, we have to win.
translation.zh: 索菲 我们必须要赢

translation.en: [in Croatian] Yes, this is for the World Cup.
translation.zh: 是啊 这可是世界杯呢

translation.en: Who is the captain when you don't play?
translation.zh: 你不上场 那谁是队长啊？

translation.en: -[boy] Perišić. -Perišić.
translation.zh: -佩里希奇-佩里希奇

translation.en: [girl] Who is the captain when Perišić or you aren't playing?
translation.zh: 如果佩里希奇和你都不上场时谁会是队长？

translation.en: [Modrić] Lovren or Vida.
translation.zh: 洛夫伦或者维达

translation.en: Is Vida playing?
translation.zh: 维达上场了？

translation.en: No, he has yellow cards, so he can't.
translation.zh: 没有 他吃了黄牌 所以不能上场

translation.en: -Two? -Yes, two.
translation.zh: -两张？-对 两张

translation.en: Was he angry?
translation.zh: 他生气吗？

translation.en: [exhales] Yes, very.
translation.zh: 嗯 气疯了

translation.en: -[in English] Give me the ball. -[Sofia] It's my ball.
translation.zh: -请把球给我-不要 这是我的球

translation.en: No, it's my ball.
translation.zh: 不 这是我的球

translation.en: -[Sofia] No, it's mine. -It's my ball.
translation.zh: -不是 是我的-是我的球

translation.en: It's my ball, yes.
translation.zh: 是我的球 就是

translation.en: -Ema's ball. -My ball.
translation.zh: -艾玛的球-我的球

translation.en: -[Sofia] Hey, share. -Share. Okay.
translation.zh: -嘿 一起玩-一起玩 行

translation.en: You didn't share with me.
translation.zh: 你刚刚就没和我一起玩

translation.en: Yes, she always shares.
translation.zh: 有 她每次都会一起玩的

translation.en: [Modrić in Croatian] It's hard for me when I'm not with the national team.
translation.zh: 不能和国家队并肩作战对我来说非常煎熬

translation.en: [in French] Are we ready?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？

translation.en: [reporter] Only five African teams will qualify for Qatar 2022.
translation.zh: 只有五支非洲的球队有资格参加2022卡塔尔世界杯

translation.en: Egypt are the big favorites here in Franceville.
translation.zh: 目前在弗朗斯维尔埃及是最热门的球队

translation.en: Can Aubameyang's men cause an upset tonight
translation.zh: 奥巴梅扬的队员们在面对这支

translation.en: and reignite their campaign against this talented Egypt side
translation.zh: 由天下无双的默罕默德萨拉赫率领的天才战队埃及队时

translation.en: led by the incomparable Mohamed Salah?
translation.zh: 能否爆冷获胜 重燃斗志？

translation.en: [in English] Rock, paper, scissors, shoot!
translation.zh: 石头、剪子、布！

translation.en: [reporter 1 in Jamaican Patois] If Jamaica wins today,
translation.zh: 如果牙买加今天能够取胜

translation.en: we are back into the thick of things. Right?
translation.zh: 我们就能重回聚光灯下了 对吧？

translation.en: [reporter 2] We just have to make sure that we get the ball to whoever's up top
translation.zh: 我们只需要确保把球传给前面的人

translation.en: to put into the back of the net.
translation.zh: 然后把它弄进网里

translation.en: Andre Blake doing his best, letting none go in.
translation.zh: 安德烈布莱克拼尽全力 不让球进去

translation.en: [reporter 1 in English] Jamaica will win this game. I feel it.
translation.zh: 这场比赛牙买加能赢 我能感觉到

translation.en: [Blake] Wearing the captain's band,
translation.zh: 戴上队长臂章

translation.en: you can't show your teammates certain things.
translation.zh: 有些东西就不能让你的队友们看到

translation.en: They're looking to you,
translation.zh: 他们都仰仗着你…

translation.en: so you can't show fear,
translation.zh: 所以你不能露怯

translation.en: you can't show nerves.
translation.zh: 不能显露出紧张

translation.en: [in Croatian] When you watch the game, are you nervous or not?
translation.zh: 你看比赛的时候会紧张吗？

translation.en: Are you nervous or not?
translation.zh: 你会紧张吗？

translation.en: Do you think we'll win?
translation.zh: 你觉得我们会赢吗？

translation.en: Sometimes.
translation.zh: 有时候

translation.en: [Modrić] When you're watching on TV, it's really nerve-racking.
translation.zh: 在电视上看比赛 真的很让人紧张

translation.en: You get much more nervous than when you play.
translation.zh: 比自己上场还要紧张得多

translation.en: [commentator] Now the real fight starts.
translation.zh: 现在 真正的战斗开始了 （克罗地亚-6分 俄罗斯-6分）

translation.en: Tonight against Russia, it couldn't be harder.
translation.zh: 今晚和俄罗斯的对战艰难到无以复加

translation.en: [in French] Every ball, every minute, we give everything, boys. Everything.
translation.zh: 每个球、每一分钟我们都要竭尽全力 小伙子们 尽全力

translation.en: Nobody gives up.
translation.zh: 谁都不能放弃

translation.en: [Blake in English] Out in eight, gents. Get yourself ready.
translation.zh: 八分钟后上场 先生们 请做好准备

translation.en: [man in French] Strong, guys.
translation.zh: 雄起 各位 雄起

translation.en: [Aubameyang] Together!
translation.zh: 团结

translation.en: Right until the end. Come on!
translation.zh: 拼搏到最后 加油！

translation.en: [Blake in Jamaican Patois] Now! Let's go!
translation.zh: 好了 走吧！

translation.en: [in French] It's a World Cup qualifier. Don't forget that. Keep it in mind.
translation.zh: 这是世界杯的预选赛别忘了这一点 记住了

translation.en: Let's give everything. We can do it. Come on!
translation.zh: 全力以赴 我们可以的 加油

translation.en: [all chanting in Jamaican Patois] We will do! We will do! Jamaica!
translation.zh: 必胜！必胜！必胜！牙买加！

translation.en: [in French] Come on, boys!
translation.zh: 加油 各位！

translation.en: [Blake in English] As a group, how hard are we willing to work?
translation.zh: 作为一个团队我们愿意付诸多少努力？

translation.en: How much are we willing to suffer?
translation.zh: 我们愿意承受多少磨砺？

translation.en: You're talking about the World Cup.
translation.zh: 这可是世界杯啊

translation.en: [commentator in French] Welcome to Franceville for the match
translation.zh: 欢迎来到弗朗斯维尔观看这场

translation.en: between the Panthers and the Pharaohs.
translation.zh: “黑豹”与“法老”之间的对决

translation.en: Gabon versus Egypt.
translation.zh: 加蓬对战埃及

translation.en: [Aubameyang] Everyone always expects the most from you.
translation.zh: 每个人都总是对你抱有最大的期待

translation.en: When we're in the tunnel,
translation.zh: 所以当我们在通道里时

translation.en: it's a very special moment.
translation.zh: 那是个非常特别的时刻

translation.en: You see the pitch, and you can't wait to get out there.
translation.zh: 你能看到球场而且已经迫不及待想要冲过去

translation.en: [commentator] Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, the captain.
translation.zh: 队长皮埃尔埃梅里克奥巴梅扬

translation.en: The Panthers will rely on him a lot today.
translation.zh: “黑豹队”今晚会非常依赖他

translation.en: [Sofia in English] One, two! One, two, three!
translation.zh: 一 二！一 二 三！

translation.en: [commentator in Croatian] Russia, our opponents tonight, are the toughest team in the group.
translation.zh: 我们今晚的对手俄罗斯队是小组当中最强的队伍

translation.en: [commentator in French] Here we go. The kick-off whistle.
translation.zh: 比赛开始了 开球哨

translation.en: [Aubameyang] I think we have a lot of potential.
translation.zh: 我认为我们非常有潜力

translation.en: I've always said it.
translation.zh: 我一直都这么说

translation.en: I think it's the best generation I've ever known.
translation.zh: 我认为这是据我所知最棒的一代球员

translation.en: [commentator in English] Panama will get things underway.
translation.zh: （牙买加对战巴拿马世界杯预选赛 中北美赛区） 巴拿马将推动这一进程他们把球从左边踢到了右边

translation.en: We're kicking from left to right.
translation.zh: 巴拿马将推动这一进程他们把球从左边踢到了右边

translation.en: [commentator in Croatian] Without Modrić today,
translation.zh: 由于队长莫德里奇今晚缺席

translation.en: Perišić accepts the task of captaincy.
translation.zh: 佩里希奇接手了队长的重任

translation.en: Miranchuk. He's a very dangerous player.
translation.zh: 米兰楚克 他是个非常危险的球员

translation.en: He shoots. It's gone over the bar.
translation.zh: 他射门了 球飞出了门框

translation.en: Close him down.
translation.zh: 盯死他

translation.en: [commentator in English] Jamaica trying to build from their half.
translation.zh: 牙买加试图在他们的半场组织队形

translation.en: We're getting pushed back so deep!
translation.zh: 我们被压得太靠后了！

translation.en: [commentator] Jamaica giving away possession.
translation.zh: 牙买加失去了控球权

translation.en: Panama on the attack, puts the play on the left-hand side
translation.zh: 巴拿马组织进攻 将球转移到了左侧

translation.en: right down to Rodriguez.
translation.zh: 传给了罗德里格斯

translation.en: A shot! And right to goalkeeper Blake, diving to his right.
translation.zh: 射门！射向了门将布莱克的右侧 他向右扑救

translation.en: [Blake] We couldn't put five passes together.
translation.zh: 我们无法连续完成五次传球

translation.en: It was just chaotic.
translation.zh: 简直就是一团混乱

translation.en: [commentator] Panama on the attack. What a strike!
translation.zh: 巴拿马进攻 精彩的射门！

translation.en: [Blake] There was no cohesiveness. There was no chemistry.
translation.zh: 没有凝聚力 没有化学反应

translation.en: [commentator in Croatian] A chance for Croatia.
translation.zh: 克罗地亚的机会来了

translation.en: Perišić. It wasn't a great shot. It surprised him.
translation.zh: 佩里希奇 精彩的射门 让他很意外

translation.en: [commentator in French] Mohamed Salah has magnificent control.
translation.zh: 默罕默德萨拉赫的控球能力出神入化

translation.en: A fantastic pass there.
translation.zh: 漂亮的传球

translation.en: Now, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang.
translation.zh: 现在 皮埃尔埃梅里克奥巴梅扬

translation.en: A goal. No! The save from El Shenawy.
translation.zh: 球进了 不！艾尔谢纳维成功扑救

translation.en: I was sure that was a goal.
translation.zh: 我还想着肯定踢进去了

translation.en: [commentator in English] Forward again. Here comes Panama. Floats the ball inside the penalty area.
translation.zh: 再次向前推 现在是巴拿马队将球传到禁区内

translation.en: Header! Beautiful header!
translation.zh: 头球！漂亮的头球！

translation.en: [Blake] After the second goal…
translation.zh: 丢了第二个球后…

translation.en: [commentator] Oh my word!
translation.zh: 我的天啊！

translation.en: [Blake] …"Am I dreaming? Is this happening for real?"
translation.zh: …“我是在做梦吗？这一切真的正在发生吗？

translation.en: "Will somebody wake me up?"
translation.zh: 谁会来把我叫醒吗？”

translation.en: [commentator] The visitors, they're leading by two goals to nil.
translation.zh: 客场球队 他们以二比零领先

translation.en: [commentator in French] Nil-nil between Gabon and Egypt.
translation.zh: 加蓬与埃及目前是零比零

translation.en: [commentator in Croatian] Croatia have had more possession but have done nothing with it.
translation.zh: 克罗地亚的控球时间更长但最终什么也没有做到

translation.en: [commentator in English] Coach Tappa Whitmore of the Jamaica team has to make some changes
translation.zh: 牙买加队的塔帕惠特莫尔教练不得不做出一些调整

translation.en: because Panama, they're all over the Jamaicans at the present time.
translation.zh: 因为巴拿马目前完全碾压着牙买加球队

translation.en: [player 1] To me, I think we should start by pressing them.
translation.zh: 要我说 我觉得我们应该开始压着他们踢

translation.en: We're at home. We're down 2-0. We need to chase the game.
translation.zh: 我们是主场我们0比2落后 我们需要奋起直追

translation.en: We need a structure of pressing them. We go, we get picked off.
translation.zh: 我们需要组织起来 压制他们我们一松懈 就会被淘汰

translation.en: [player 2] It's not structure.
translation.zh: 这不算组织

translation.en: Need to change formation. We're too open in midfield.
translation.zh: 改变阵型 你们在中场的时候太散了

translation.en: -We need someone in the midfield. -[coach] Stop talking.
translation.zh: （拉威尔莫里森 牙买加中锋） -中场需要有人在-别说了

translation.en: Before you talk about formation, before you talk about anything, right?
translation.zh: 在你们谈论阵型前在你们发表任何见解前

translation.en: They're outfighting us.
translation.zh: 他们正在碾压我们

translation.en: They're quicker to the ball.
translation.zh: 他们拿球更快

translation.en: They are quicker to the second balls, guys.
translation.zh: 他们接球更快 各位

translation.en: Right? We're pressing and just jogging up to the ball.
translation.zh: 我们会向前推 但都是慢慢朝着球跑

translation.en: It's like a testimonial!
translation.zh: 这就像是证明！

translation.en: What is that all about? They're moving quicker than us.
translation.zh: 那是什么情况？他们的速度比我们快

translation.en: We are at home!
translation.zh: 我们是主场啊！

translation.en: We are at home. You can do any formation you want.
translation.zh: 我们是在主场你们想用什么阵型都行

translation.en: They run faster, quicker than you, guess what?
translation.zh: 他们跑得更快比你们都快 猜猜怎么着？

translation.en: We get beat.
translation.zh: 我们输了

translation.en: Come on. Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: [in French] We give it all until the end.
translation.zh: 我们竭尽全力拼到最后

translation.en: If you're tired, come off and the subs give everything too.
translation.zh: 如果你累了休息一下 替补也要竭尽全力

translation.en: -We're in the game, boys. -[man] We're in the game.
translation.zh: 我们还有希望 伙计们

translation.en: We're in it.
translation.zh: 我们还有希望

translation.en: [in English] They need to think this is a cauldron, and it's too hot.
translation.zh: 他们需要把这里想成一口大热锅

translation.en: Somebody take some leadership.
translation.zh: 得有人起带头作用

translation.en: Somebody just take the game by the scruff of the neck and go.
translation.zh: 得有人掌控全局 放手一搏

translation.en: [in French] It's time to score, guys. We are hungry.
translation.zh: 是时候得点分了 各位 我们都很渴望

translation.en: Come on, guys.
translation.zh: 来吧 各位

translation.en: -[whistle blows] -[tense music plays]
translation.zh: （下半场）

translation.en: [commentator] There is nothing between these two teams despite the Panthers' dominance.
translation.zh: 尽管“黑豹队”占尽优势但两队比分毫无突破

translation.en: And here we have Boupendza.
translation.zh: 现在是布潘德扎带球

translation.en: One-on-one with Mohamed El Shenawy.
translation.zh: 和默罕默德萨拉赫一对一

translation.en: [Aubameyang] We had a great game, a great game,
translation.zh: 我们踢得很精彩 非常精彩

translation.en: and we are rewarded.
translation.zh: 我们得到了回报

translation.en: [commentator] What's going on? What's going on?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: Oh, it's a red card.
translation.zh: 哦 一张红牌

translation.en: [Aubameyang] Of course, that gives us that extra energy, and it gives you hope.
translation.zh: 毋庸置疑这给了我们更多力量 给人以希望

translation.en: So it was the moment to take points off them.
translation.zh: 所以 现在是时候进球得分了

translation.en: [in Jamaican Patois] Move up! Move up! Move up!
translation.zh: 向前！

translation.en: [in English] At 2-0, are we still in the game? At least to get a point.
translation.zh: 2比0的时候 我们还有希望吗？至少要得一分

translation.en: I do feel, um, somewhat distant as the goalkeeper.
translation.zh: 作为门将 我确实觉得有些疏离

translation.en: And it can be very frustrating, you know? Especially whenever I get scored on.
translation.zh: 这让人很沮丧 你懂吗？尤其是当我没能拦到球时

translation.en: [commentator] Waterman, he dances,
translation.zh: 沃特曼 他虚晃了一下

translation.en: and beats the goalkeeper, Blake, to his left.
translation.zh: 骗过了门将布莱克 踢到了他的左边

translation.en: Oh my word.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: That's cherry on the top, icing on the cake.
translation.zh: 这简直就是锦上添花 肥肉上添膘啊

translation.en: [Blake] That was like the dagger. That's it.
translation.zh: 这就像是把匕首 没戏了

translation.en: [commentator in Croatian] Ivanušec enters the box. Ivanušec shoots.
translation.zh: 伊万努斯克进入了禁区伊万努斯克射门

translation.en: Man, we're five times better than them. Come on.
translation.zh: 天啊 我们比他们厉害五倍呢 加油

translation.en: [commentator in French] It's Obiang. One-two.
translation.zh: 现在是奥比昂 1比2

translation.en: He's in the penalty area.
translation.zh: 他进入了禁区

translation.en: They shoot and they score!
translation.zh: 射门 得分！

translation.en: The Panthers claw the Egyptian Pharaohs.
translation.zh: 加蓬“黑豹”挠了埃及“法老”一爪

translation.en: -One-zero. -[fans cheering, applauding]
translation.zh: 一比零 （加蓬1-0领先埃及 73分钟）

translation.en: [in Croatian] Clear it away.
translation.zh: 大脚解围

translation.en: Clear it!
translation.zh: 大脚解围！

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在干嘛呢？

translation.en: [commentator] Kovačić. Kovačić! What an opportunity, but it's wide.
translation.zh: 科瓦契奇 科瓦契奇！多好的机会啊 但是太偏了

translation.en: [commentator] If that had gone in, Croatia would be celebrating at the Luzhniki Stadium.
translation.zh: 如果这个球进了 克罗地亚队就能在卢日尼基体育场庆祝了

translation.en: [commentator in English] And that signals the end of the matchup.
translation.zh: 而这也标志着比赛的结束

translation.en: Captain Blake looks dejected.
translation.zh: 布莱克队长看起来非常沮丧

translation.en: [Blake] It could have easily been 6-0.
translation.zh: 结果很可能是6比0

translation.en: We didn't fight hard enough. We didn't show enough character.
translation.zh: 我们还不够拼命我们没有表现出足够的个性 （牙买加0-3负于巴拿马 全场结束）

translation.en: [in Croatian] Well, a point is not bad if we beat Slovakia and Slovenia.
translation.zh: 好吧 一分也不错如果我们打败斯洛伐克和斯洛文尼亚

translation.en: [Aubameyang in French] I don't think I've ever seen Gabon play so well.
translation.zh: 我应该从没见过加蓬踢得这么好过

translation.en: We started to believe.
translation.zh: 我们开始有了信念

translation.en: [commentator] We're in the last minutes of this match.
translation.zh: 比赛进行到了最后几分钟

translation.en: The final push.
translation.zh: 最后一搏

translation.en: Aubameyang is full of fighting spirit.
translation.zh: 奥巴梅扬充满了斗志

translation.en: [Aubameyang] It was a strange game.
translation.zh: 那是场奇怪的比赛

translation.en: [commentator] A victory here would give them a chance in the group after the defeat to Libya.
translation.zh: 在输给利比亚后本场比赛的胜利能给他们带来机会

translation.en: [Aubameyang] At that moment, we were on the right path.
translation.zh: 当时 我们的策略很成功

translation.en: But…
translation.zh: 但是…

translation.en: you have to be focused.
translation.zh: 你必须集中精力

translation.en: Every detail counts until the last second.
translation.zh: 在结束前 每个细节都很重要

translation.en: [commentator] Attention. Watch out.
translation.zh: 注意 小心
